__TOC__

This is the record type for a DVD database. It's trivial and was just created for purposes of this Quickly Demo video:
http://theravingrick.blogspot.com/2009/10/quickly-demo-part-1.html

This record has the following fields:

* Title
* Year
* Studio
* Format
* Run Time

These are all strings.
